reviews.text:
Train station with 2 platforms and trains that go through are operated by Great Western Railway

It has the train service to/ from Bristol Temple Meads to Avonmouth/Severn Beach (cheap train tickets)  and  to/from Bristol Temple Meads (BTM)  to Bristol Parkway (BP)

If going to BTM or BP then there are the options for changing to services further afield 

With the relaying of 2 extra tracks and the introduction of new trains (teething problems allowed for) the problems of delays are easing BUT this does not mean that they are either  still liable to delays or cancellations or any other problems such as staffing and problems beyond their control!!

Great station that can be used for changing which I have done but the new bridge especially for disabled or bikes is extremely long - an could be the 2nd longest in the UK!!

Information boards are up and real time information as long as it is working

No ticket machine so buy your ticket on the train

I love the murals that are on the platform was you come out of BTM
If I could close my eyes whilst driving through there, I would. The graffiti artists think they own something by simply 'tagging' it, and they're welcome to it…all of it
Train arrived on time, pleasant journey to Bristol Temple Meads then on to Bath
Very convenient train service, just wish there were less delays...
Nice views but the shelters are a bit small and rainy
